text: Far Cry 2 is a 2008 first-person shooter game made by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. It is the second main game in the Far Cry series. The mobile version of the game is made and published by Gameloft. title: Far Cry 2
